text: w'in ealimtum -ya 'awlia' alzwjyn- shqaqana baynahuma yuadiy 'iilaa alfraq, fa'arsaluu 'ilyhma hkmana edla min 'ahl alzwj, whkmana edla min 'ahl alzwjt; lynzra wyhkma bma fyh almaslahat lhma, wbsbb raghbat alhkmyn fi al'islah, wastemalhma al'uslub altayib yuafiq allah bayn alzwjyn. 'iina allah taealaa elym, la yakhfaa ealayh shay' min 'amr ebadh, khabir bima tntwy ealayh nfwshm
